search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for SalesRabbit (salesrabbit.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for SalesRabbit can be accessed at: [https://salesrabbit.com/pricing/](https://salesrabbit.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
Pricing - SalesRabbit/RoofLink
===============

 

[Skip to content](https://salesrabbit.com/pricing/#primary)

[![Image 1: SalesRabbit](https://i0.wp.com/salesrabbit.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/sr_logo-1.png?fit=452%2C120&ssl=1)](https://salesrabbit.com/)[SalesRabbit](https://salesrabbit.com/)

Door-to-Door Sales App

*   Products
    *   *   *   #### Products
                
                *   [SalesRabbit Platform](https://salesrabbit.com/field-sales-platform)Build, manage and streamline your field sales process.
                    
                *   [SalesRabbit Lite](https://salesrabbit.com/lite)Get a taste of the SalesRabbit Platform with the Lite app.
                    
                
        *   *   #### Applications

                *   [Canvassing](https://salesrabbit.com/canvassing)Door to Door Sales  
                    [Lead Generation](https://salesrabbitapp.wpcomstaging.com/lead-generation/)  
                    [Territory Mapping](https://salesrabbitapp.wpcomstaging.com/sales-territory-mapping/)  
                    [Lead Management](https://salesrabbitapp.wpcomstaging.com/lead-management/)
                    
                *   [DataGrid AI](https://salesrabbit.com/datagrid)Buyer Scores & Homeowner info

                    [Businesses](https://salesrabbitapp.wpcomstaging.com/datagrid/business-search/)  
                    [Machine Learning](https://salesrabbitapp.wpcomstaging.com/datagrid/machine-learning/)
                    
                *   [Amplify](https://salesrabbit.com/amplify-gamification/)Reporting & Motivation Software

                *   [Scheduler](https://salesrabbit.com/lead-management/scheduler/)Multi-User Appointment Management

                *   [Mover Leads](https://salesrabbit.com/mover-leads/)New Home Buyers Mapped
                    
                *   [Learn](https://salesrabbit.com/learn/)Training Platform & Library
                    
                
*   Solutions
    *   *   *   #### Field Sales Solutions
                
                *   [Field Sales](https://salesrabbit.com/field-sales-overview)Full suite of tools and integrations, including lead generation, team management, and team reporting.
                    
                *   [For Enterprise](https://salesrabbit.com/enterprise)Implement advanced security functionality and admin and data controls, with access to the full tool suite.
                    
                *   [For Small & Medium Businesses](https://salesrabbit.com/small-medium-businesses/)Optimize your field sales with the right tools to create a state-of-the-art, revenue-generating machine.
                    
                *   [For Individuals](https://salesrabbit.com/lite)Gain free access to some of SalesRabbit's features to check out core functions. For anyone without a team.
                    
                *   [Roofing Sales Software](https://salesrabbit.com/roofing-sales-software)Roofing solutions designed by roofers. Simplify work, improve relationships, and close deals faster.

Bundle SalesRabbit + RoofLink  
for Massive Savings
---------------------------------------------------

Combine the best-in-class field sales platform with the premium roofing CRM to create the ultimate roofing tech platform.

![Image 2: logos](https://salesrabbit.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/03/logos-1.png)

[Get Started](https://salesrabbit.com/pricing/#get-started "Get Started")

Trusted by over 85,000 sales professionals worldwide.
-----------------------------------------------------

![Image 3](https://i0.wp.com/salesrabbit.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/sr_web_logos.png?fit=5550%2C896&ssl=1)

#### The Platform Advantage

Do More With One Complete Solution
----------------------------------

Canvassing
----------

Teams need a way to stay organized with leads; that’s where intelligent field sales management software comes in. Do more by taking care of lead generation, lead management, and sales territory mapping all in one.  
  
• Included in all SalesRabbit plans

DataGrid AI
-----------

DataGrid AI uses machine learning and thousands of data points to identify your industry’s ideal customer. It then analyzes homeowner and business information and assigns a Buyer Score to homes, neighborhoods, counties, cities, and states. And for B2B, local business search is also included.  
  
• $19 billed annually per user/month  
• $26 billed quarterly per user/month  

Amplify
-------

SalesRabbit’s Amplify is a cutting-edge solution for analytics and gamification, designed to transform your field sales team by tapping into the power of data. You can motivate your team and experience remarkable results. Get the future of improved sales performance now.  
  
• Analytics included in SalesRabbit Team plan  
• Analytics & Gamification included in SalesRabbit Pro & Enterprise plans

RoofLink
--------

Our premier all-in-one roofing CRM designed to streamline every aspect of your professional workflow. Built by roofers for roofers.  
  
• $120 per user

Weather
-------

Weather maps are key for restoration companies who want to quickly and effectively work areas with roof or home damage. Our map overlays are generated in-app, so you can quickly pull up storm data and go to high-opportunity areas without worrying about integrations.  
  
• $19 billed annually per user/month  
• $26 billed quarterly per user/month

Scheduler
---------

In field sales, time is a precious commodity, and juggling appointments while on the go can be time-consuming and cumbersome. That’s why SalesRabbit’s Scheduler simplifies appointment management, providing a reliable solution designed for the needs of field sales professionals.  
  
• Included in SalesRabbit Pro & Enterprise plans

Digital Contracts
-----------------

Our form builder and contract creator makes it possible for every sales team to go completely digital and completely mobile. Shed your paper costs, eliminate data entry errors, collect electronic signatures, and accelerate your sales.  
  
• $13 billed annually per user/month  
• $17 billed quarterly per user/month

Movers
------

Every year, 40 million Americans move houses. When they do, they spend thousands of dollars on new goods and services to make that house feel like home. We’ve created a way for companies to know when these moves are happening so they can be the ﬁrst to offer their products or services.  
  
• $13 billed annually per user/month  
• $17 billed quarterly per user/month

Learn
-----

With tools to both create and upload content, building your own training library is now easier than ever. Today’s top sales instructors are here to show you what sets the best teams apart from the competition.  
  
• $13 billed annually per user/month  
• $17 billed quarterly per user/month

Have pricing questions? [Chat with us](https://salesrabbit.com/pricing/#chat) or [schedule a demo](https://salesrabbit.com/pricing/#demo) and a SalesRabbit expert will walk you through your options.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[Get Started](https://salesrabbit.com/pricing/#get-started "Get Started")

FAQs
----

Is an implementation package always required? What does it cover?
-----------------------------------------------------------------

Yes. Our implementation packages include getting a new account set up and launched, which is an expensive process, and the implementation packages help cover those expenses so that we can continue to keep your monthly costs low. The packages vary in cost depending on how much hands-on assistance your team will need getting up and running. They come in the following packages: Basic, Guided, Premium, and Custom.

Is there a free trial?
----------------------

We don’t support a free trial of our paid plans, but we do offer a free version of our app: [SalesRabbit Lite](https://salesrabbit.com/lite). Lite doesn’t include the full functionality or team management tools of our Team or Pro plans, but it’s a great way for a single user to try out some of our core features and get a feel for how the app works.

Is there a long-term contract?
------------------------------

Yes, we do contracts from one to three years. We lock in pricing for the term of the agreement and offer both quarterly or annual billing options on most of our plans.

How does billing work?
----------------------

We offer both quarterly and annual billing options on most of our plans. Each billing cycle has its own method for billing:

ANNUAL: All seats are paid upfront for one year. SalesRabbit bills for seats, not users, which means that a seat can be occupied by multiple users throughout the year, one user at a time. When a user is inactivated a seat is freed up. The next time a user is activated the freed-up seat will be used automatically and you will not be billed. You purchase a set number of seats which are equal to the maximum number of users that can be active at one time. Each login (canvasser, sales rep, manager, admin, owner, etc) will be counted as a user that occupies a seat. If any users are added beyond the seat limit, you will be billed a prorated amount for the new seats from the day the users are added until the end of the billing period. The number of seats invoiced each year will equal the minimum number of seats required or the number of active users on the account, whichever is higher. After payment has been made to the initial invoice, additional invoices will be automatically billed to the method of payment on file.

QUARTERLY: All seats are paid upfront for 3 months at a time (one quarter). SalesRabbit bills for seats, not users, which means that a seat can be occupied by multiple users throughout the quarter, one user at a time. When a user is inactivated a seat is freed up. The next time a user is activated the freed-up seat will be used automatically and you will not be billed. You purchase a set number of seats which are equal to the maximum number of users that can be active at one time. Each login (canvasser, sales rep, manager, admin, owner, etc) will be counted as a user that occupies a seat. If any users are added beyond the seat limit, you will be billed a prorated amount for the new seats from the day the users are added until the end of the billing period. The number of seats invoiced every 3 months will equal the minimum number of seats required or the number of active users on the account, whichever is higher. After payment has been made to the initial invoice, additional invoices will be automatically billed to the method of payment on file.

Is there a cancellation fee?
----------------------------

No. We do not refund charges if you cancel in the middle of a billing cycle, so keep in mind that the cancelation process needs to be completed before the next billing cycle starts. If you sign back up after 30 days, there will be a new implementation fee.

Do the "additional capabilities" cost extra?
--------------------------------------------

Yes. These are in addition to the cost of the Team, Pro, or Enterprise plans. See our pricing above for more details or check out our [expanded pricing breakdown](https://salesrabbit.com/features). DataGrid AI is the only additional capability available on the Team plan.

Is my data secure?
------------------

Absolutely. We take data security very seriously and use industry-standard practices to protect you. Your data is never shared with any third party without your permission. We limit users’ access to data and adhere to strict password standards. We also keep systems limited to their own network spaces and all data and network communications are encrypted.

If I cancel my subscription do I lose all of my data/leads?
-----------------------------------------------------------

Yes, eventually. You’ll have the opportunity to download and store your data before it becomes inaccessible.

Is there a per contract processing fee?
---------------------------------------

No. It’s included in the Pro Plan and/or Digital Contracts pricing.
